data.content: Either answer a question related to the story or answer a question about your self.
Discuss with your partner and write a dialogue for the chosen option.

content.name: What was the boy afraid of?
content.quesionTranscript: What was the boy afraid of?
content.instructions:
• Listen to the model conversation below.
  • Discuss with your partner,choose a role and create a dialogue for the chosen option.
  • You can also use the words and phrases from the word cloud on your screen to create your dialogue.
  • After you have practised,click 'Record'.
  • If you want to hear your recording, click on the play button.
  • If you are happy with your recording, click on 'Save File'.
content.modelAnsTranscript:
A: He was afraid of the tiger under this bed.
B: He was afraid of the dark.

content.name: What happened when the lights came on?
content.quesionTranscript: WHAT HAPPENED WHEN THE LIGHTS CAME ON?
content.modelAnsTranscript: A: The boy saw that it was only a sweater. </br> B: The boy saw that there was no tiger.

content.quesionTranscript: Why are we afraid of the dark?
content.name: Why are we afraid of the dark?
content.modelAnsTranscript: We are afraid because we can't see anything. </br> We cannot see anything and we don't know what will happen.
